item.title: Oh-My-Zsh安装
item.description: 安装Git以及zsh 1 # apt-get install git zsh 下载项目到本地 1 git clone https://github.com/robbyrussell/oh-my-zsh.git ~/.oh-my-zsh 如果根目录之下有.zshrc这个zsh的配置文件则备份 1 cp ~/.zshrc ~/.zshrc.back 通过oh-my-zsh
